Title: Relates to standardizing child care copayments
Summary: Standardizes child care copayments by instructing local social services districts to not require a family receiving child care assistance to contribute more than 20% of the amount of their income exceeding the poverty level.
LawCode: Amd ยง410-x, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to standardizing child care copayments
